journal-meta.journal-title: Vision: The Journal of Business Perspective

body.p: 1. Prasad, L.M. (2012). Principles and practice of management, New Delhi: Sultan Chand & Sons (Eighth Edition), xvi + 776 pp., ₹ 365 [Paperback].

2. Varshney, R.L, & Bhattacharya B. (2012). International marketing management: An Indian perspective, New Delhi: Sultan Chand & Sons (Twenty-Fourth Edition), 670 + A-4 to A-82 pp., ₹ 350 [Paperback].
3. Briscoe, Jon P., Hall Douglas, T., & Mayrhofer (Eds). (2012). Careers around the word: Individual and contextual perspective, New York: Routledge, xvii + 379, Price not mentioned [Paperback].
